item.title: Staking Your ODIN Tokens
item.description: Staking your crypto currency is one of the best ways to make some passive income. But it is also important to choose the right project and delegator to maximize the benefits.

item.title: Staking Your Vega Tokens
item.description: BREAKING : VEGA restricted mainnet is live since November, 24th of 2021. Catch the opportunity and start staking your VEGA tokens on our node following the steps below.
